channel.title: Help...Need to have a monster give "starter pts"
channel.description:
I have a "starter" thing set up so it gives 1 starter point at the beginning, and it gives you cash n junk... any way i could make a monster give starter points? (I have it so that once you reach 500 starter pts you get more stuff, and same with 1000 and etc...)
Like, when you kill the monster... it automaticly adds like 1 starter point or something to your thingy:)
If someone could tell me how to do this, thanks!
(I'm pretty sure it works the same way as having an NPC teleport you after it's killed)
THIS DOESN'T HAVE TO DO WITH NPCDROPS.CF FUCKING G.

item.title: Help...Need to have a monster give "starter pts"
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

No, that class doesn’t fully consist of “drops”. It’s for the effect after you kill a monster. So, instead of giving items, make it give points.

It’s not the npcdrops.cfg I’m talking about, it’s the npchandler.java if I’m not mistaken.

Read full topic
item.source: Help...Need to have a monster give "starter pts"

item.title: Help...Need to have a monster give "starter pts"
item.dc:creator: @PushedPrawn PushedPrawn
item.description:
@PushedPrawn wrote:

[quote=“The Reaper X, post:2, topic:309625”][quote author=PushedPrawn link=topic=406077.msg3001306#msg3001306 date=1256008907]
THIS DOESN’T HAVE TO DO WITH NPCDROPS.CF FUCKING G.
[/quote]The class that handles npc drops is what this has to deal with.[/quote]

Erm, NO. I don’t think so, that drops items. What i want it to give isn’t exactly an “item.” It’s kinda like PC points from pest control. Not an actual item, though… If I’m wrong, since I’m not perfect, correct me. I’m thinking you mean my Npcdrops.CFG where all the item drops are for the NPC’s.

Thanks for your reply, though!

Read full topic
item.source: Help...Need to have a monster give "starter pts"
